amendment.description: Amendment specifies Congressional goals of the United States in the conflict with the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia including the cessation of all military action against the people of Kosovo and the termination of the violence against the people of Kosovo.
amendment.purpose: An amendment no. 17 and printed in H.Rept. 106-175 to specify Congressional goals of the United States in the conflict with the Federal Republic of Yugoslavia including the cessation of all military action against the people of Kosovo and the termination of the violence against the people of Kosovo.

action.text: Taylor (MS) amendment (A015) modified by unanimous consent. The modification strikes paragraphs (a) (2) and (a) (3) relating to the War Powers Resolution and the Congressional acknowledgment of a conflict in Yugoslavia.
On agreeing to the Taylor (MS) amendment (A015) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
